articles.author: The Weather Channel
articles.title: NASA Launches 'Mission TEMPO' to Monitor Air Pollution From Space | Weather.com - The Weather Channel
articles.description: TEMPO will be the first space-based instrument to measure air quality over North America hourly during the daytime and at spatial regions of several square miles.
articles.content:
The US space agency on Saturday launched a powerful new instrument into space to track air pollution, which would provide unprecedented resolution of monitoring major air pollutants.

articles.title: SpaceX Falcon 9 Launches Air Pollution Monitor | Weather.com - The Weather Channel
articles.description: The TEMPO sensor will measure air pollution in North America on an hourly basis.
articles.content:
At a Glance
